name: Superstar Superhero
description:
I have a week to update this description right? I'm tired

You are not the hero. You are the hero's tv agent. You must set up scenarios for them to fight through.

They need to be exciting and dangerous to boost your ratings, but don't kill the hero!

Reach 2500 dollars

Buy Things in the main screen to construct challenges for your hero.

Go to a site, and then place them around so that you create a level that will navigate and be exciting.

Your ratings are constantly falling, your hero needs to constantly be doing something.

The higher your ratings, the more your revenue

Powers:

Laser: Will fire a laser beam at enemy

Explode: If surrounded, will explode and kill all enemies

Jump: Jumps over obstacle

Store:  Stores damage taken, and then unleashes it on the next victim

I had no time to playtest, sorry if it is impossible or too easy.

Credits:
